statements: SELECT * FROM firewall_rules;
SELECT rule_name, source_ip, port FROM firewall_rules WHERE protocol = 'TCP';
SELECT destination_ip, rule_name FROM firewall_rules WHERE port >= 8080 ORDER BY destination_ip DESC;
SELECT rule_name, source_ip, protocol FROM firewall_rules WHERE port < 1024 AND protocol = 'UDP';
SELECT rule_id, destination_ip, port, rule_name FROM firewall_rules ORDER BY port ASC, rule_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM firewall_rules WHERE port = 80 AND protocol = 'TCP';
SELECT rule_name, source_ip, destination_ip FROM firewall_rules WHERE protocol = 'UDP';
SELECT rule_id, rule_name, port, protocol FROM firewall_rules WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT * FROM firewall_rules WHERE destination_ip = '10.0.0.1' ORDER BY rule_name;
SELECT rule_id, rule_name, protocol FROM firewall_rules WHERE port BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY rule_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM firewall_rules ORDER BY rule_id DESC;
SELECT rule_name, rule_description FROM firewall_rules WHERE rule_protocol = 'TCP';
SELECT rule_name, rule_protocol FROM firewall_rules WHERE rule_port = 80;
SELECT rule_id, rule_name, rule_port FROM firewall_rules WHERE rule_protocol = 'UDP';
SELECT * FROM network_zones;
SELECT * FROM firewall_rules WHERE rule_protocol = 'TCP' AND rule_port > 1024;
SELECT rule_name, rule_description FROM firewall_rules WHERE rule_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM firewall_rules WHERE rule_port BETWEEN 1000 AND 1500 ORDER BY rule_port DESC;
SELECT zone_name, zone_description FROM network_zones WHERE zone_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM firewall_rules WHERE rule_protocol = 'UDP' AND rule_port < 500;
SELECT id, rule_name, rule_description, rule_type, rule_enabled FROM firewall_config WHERE id = 1;
SELECT rule_name, rule_description, rule_type, rule_enabled FROM firewall_config WHERE rule_enabled = true;
SELECT id, rule_name FROM firewall_config WHERE rule_type = 'ALLOW';
SELECT * FROM firewall_config WHERE rule_description LIKE '%block%';
SELECT id, rule_name, rule_type FROM firewall_config ORDER BY rule_type DESC, id ASC;
SELECT id, rule_name, rule_description FROM firewall_config WHERE rule_type='HTTP' AND rule_enabled=true ORDER BY rule_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM firewall_config WHERE rule_type='SSH' AND rule_enabled=true
SELECT rule_name, rule_type, rule_description FROM firewall_config WHERE rule_enabled=true ORDER BY id
SELECT id, rule_type, rule_enabled FROM firewall_config WHERE rule_description LIKE '%secure%'
SELECT * FROM firewall_config WHERE rule_enabled=true AND rule_name LIKE '%firewall%'
SELECT * FROM firewall_rules_config;
SELECT rule_name, rule_description FROM firewall_rules_config WHERE rule_allow = TRUE;
SELECT rule_name, rule_priority FROM firewall_rules_config ORDER BY rule_priority DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_settings WHERE network_name ILIKE 'internal%';
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM user_roles;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin' AND role_description LIKE '%privileged%';
SELECT network_name, network_address FROM network_settings WHERE subnet_mask = '255.255.255.0';
SELECT rule_name, rule_description, rule_priority FROM firewall_rules_config ORDER BY rule_priority DESC;
SELECT * FROM rule_audit_logs WHERE action = 'DENY' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT r.rule_name, r.rule_priority, l.action FROM firewall_rules_config r INNER JOIN rule_audit_logs l ON r.rule_id = l.rule_id;
SELECT * FROM firewall_settings;
SELECT rule_name, rule_type FROM firewall_settings ORDER BY rule_type DESC;
SELECT id, rule_name, allow_traffic FROM firewall_settings WHERE allow_traffic = TRUE;
SELECT rule_name, allow_traffic FROM firewall_settings WHERE rule_name LIKE 'fire%';
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM firewall_settings WHERE rule_type = 'incoming';
SELECT rule_name, allow_traffic FROM firewall_settings WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY rule_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM rule_conditions WHERE condition_type = 'protocol' AND condition_value = 'HTTP';
SELECT * FROM network_zones WHERE zone_description LIKE '%secure%';
SELECT access_type, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
